Package org.lwjgl.examples.spaceinvaders

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlienEntity
    An entity which represents one of our space invader aliens.
    Entity
    An entity represents any element that appears in the game.
    Game
    The main hook of our game.
    GameApplet  
    ShipEntity
    The entity that represents the players ship
    ShotEntity
    An entity representing a shot fired by the player's ship
    SoundManager
    Simple sound manager for OpenAL using n sources accessed in a round robin schedule.
    Sprite
    Implementation of sprite that uses an OpenGL quad and a texture to render a given image to the screen.
    Texture
    A texture to be bound within OpenGL.
    TextureLoader
    A utility class to load textures for OpenGL.
